htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual

Class RemoteFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.AbstractFSObject
      • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.RemoteFSObject
        • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.RemoteFolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Folder, FSObject

    public class RemoteFolder
extends RemoteFSObject
implements Folder
    A RemoteFolder represents a Folder located on a remote filesystem. This is a node in our filesystem. Created by felix on 03.06.15.

    • Field Summary
